actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to create a select committee to audit accounts of committees, Members, and officers of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Creates a select committee to conduct a study of records, memorandums, papers, documents, books, and other information of any standing or select committee or officer of the House of Representatives respecting expenses incurred by such committee. Directs the select committee to conduct a study and audit of allowances and expenses made available to Members of the House.

titles.title: A resolution to create a select committee to audit accounts of committees, Members, and officers of the House of Representatives.
